templates.title: OPC UA to MQTT Stack
templates.description: This stack deploys an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router, Mosquitto MQTT broker, and a mqtt management.
templates.note:
This stack sets up an OPC UA PLC simulation, OPC Router for data handling, Mosquitto MQTT broker for messaging, and a management from cedalo.

After deployment, you can access the OPC Router and cedalo management via the exposed ports.

Open the stack dashboard http://localhost:40080 after successfull deployment
templates.name: opcua-to-mqtt

env.name: INITIAL_USERNAME
env.label: Initial Admin User
env.description: The initial username for the OPC Router and cedalo admin user.

env.name: INITIAL_PASSWORD
env.label: Initial Admin Password
env.description: The initial password for the OPC Router and cedalo admin user. The password must be at least 12 characters long.
